resources.string: The Android robot is reproduced or modified from work created and shared by Google and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 3.0 Attribution License.
That tile cannot be moved yet

Slide the tiles around until they appear in proper order with the empty tile placed in the bottom right. \n\nTap a tile to slide it into the empty square; only tiles adjacent to the empty square may slide into it.

This Sliding Tile Puzzle application for Android™ was created by Raymond Lam for the final project of SCS2682: Mobile Applications for Android Devices.
